Package io.github.zero88.schedulerx

Interface ExecutionContext<OUT>

Type Parameters:
OUT - Type of job result data
All Superinterfaces:
HasVertx
public interface ExecutionContext<OUT> extends HasVertx
Represents for a runtime context per each execution round.
Since:
1.0.0
API Note:
This interface is renamed from TaskExecutionContext since 2.0.0
